trans-unit.source: Represents an error that occurred during composition.
trans-unit.target: 代表在組合期間發生的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref> class with the specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError.Description*> property to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 描述的訊息<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError.Description*>屬性設為空字串 ("")。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError.Description*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref> class with the specified error message and the composition element that is the cause of the composition error.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref>具有指定的錯誤訊息和組合錯誤造成的複合項目類別。

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError.Description*> property to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 描述的訊息<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError.Description*>屬性設為空字串 ("")。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError.Description*>

trans-unit.source: The composition element that is the cause of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError.Element*> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 複合項目，造成<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError.Element*>屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError.Element*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref> class with the specified error message and the exception that is the cause of the composition error.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref>具有指定的錯誤訊息和組合錯誤造成的例外狀況類別。

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError.Description*> property to an empty string ("").

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError.Exception*> that is the underlying cause of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError.Exception*> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <> </> *> 也就是根本原因的<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>設定<> *> 屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref> class with the specified error message, and the composition element and exception that are the cause of the composition error.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref>具有指定的錯誤訊息，並組合項目和是組合錯誤原因的例外狀況類別。

trans-unit.source: The composition element that is the cause of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError.Element*> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.target: <> </> *> 也就是根本原因的<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>設定<> *> 屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a description of the composition error.
trans-unit.target: 取得複合錯誤的描述。

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 描述的訊息<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the composition element that is the cause of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得造成錯誤的組合項目。

trans-unit.source: The composition element that is the cause of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 複合項目，造成<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception that is the underlying cause of the composition error.
trans-unit.target: 取得組合錯誤的根本原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the underlying cause of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 為基礎的例外狀況原因的<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the composition error.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的字串表示的組合錯誤。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError.Description*> property.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError.Description*>屬性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError.Description*>
